mapper.select: SELECT MARKET_BNO, MEMBER_ID, ALPHABET, CREATE_DATE, SELLING_STATUS, TITLE FROM ALPHABET_MARKET JOIN MEMBER ON(WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE REF_CLASS = #{classNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT MARKET_BNO, MEMBER_ID, ALPHABET, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, SELLING_STATUS, TITLE FROM ALPHABET_MARKET JOIN MEMBER ON(WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE MARKET_BNO = #{bno}

SELECT REPLY_NO, MEMBER_ID, REPLY_ALPHABET, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE, REF_MARKET, REPLY_SELECTED FROM ALPHABET_REPLY JOIN MEMBER ON(REPLY_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_MARKET = #{bno} ORDER BY REPLY_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALPHABET_REPLY JOIN MEMBER ON(REPLY_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_MARKET = #{bno}
